example[0]: A strong gust of wind blew the car sideways into the ditch.
definition[1]: with the side, rather than the front or back, facing forwards
example[1]: They brought the piano sideways through the front door.
definition[2]: if you are moved sideways at work, you are given a job that is different from, but is at the same level as, your old job
example[2]: He would be moved sideways, rather than demoted.
